main event: Four crew members observed a fast-moving brilliant object believed to be an aircraft at 11,000 feet, which changed direction and brightness during the sighting.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes, The object was initially seen as a disc traveling at high speed, The object took a 180-degree turn toward the observer's aircraft, A brilliant light appeared and changed colors from white to bright red and then diminished, The object was reported to be as fast or faster than an F-104.
location: Approximately 39 degrees 42 minutes North, 125 degrees West
